main:
This is the Announcements entry for the whole site. Use this to display announcment text in the modal linked to the Announcements button in the header. The actual content of the announcment is set with the AnnouncementsContent component, and is fetched from '/src/data/announcements.json', and is set up to accept raw HTML code so you can include links and text formatting.

Click here to go to the main Announcements page.
